section.title: Hardware
section.para: All hosts must be 64-bit and must support HVM (Intel-VT or AMD-V enabled). All Hosts within a Cluster must be homogeneous. That means the CPUs must be of the same type, count, and feature flags. See http://docs.vmd.citrix.com/XenServer/4.0.1/reference/ch02.html for more information on homogeneous XenServer hosts.

section.title: Reusing Servers
section.para: You must re-install Citrix XenServer if you are going to re-use a host from a previous install.
